H0.text: what country did buddha come from. Nepal

H1.text: what country did buddha come from. Sri Lanka

H2.text: what country did buddha come from. China

H3.text: what country did buddha come from. India

A4.text: He was born in Lumbini, in what is now Nepal.

A5.text: His mother, Maya, Suddhodana's wife, was a princess from Devdaha, the ancient capital of the Koliya Kingdom (what is now the Rupandehi District of Nepal).
